resources.string:
Match two cards with the same color and numbers.
 Two different color with same numbers cannot be matched.

 Example : 9 of Club can match to 9 of Spade but not the red color.


 Easy: Black or Red Color and 8 numbers of card (Total 16) is Played.
 Normal: Black or Red Color and 12 numbers (Total 24) is Played.
 Advanced: Two Color and 6 numbers (Total 24) is Played.
 Arranged: Two Color and 9 numbers of card (Total 36) is Played.
SEHS4542 Games 2021\nAll right reserved by Lance Chan
